body:
Isn't this doing another copy? I know, "don't prematurely optimize", but it seems to me that you are:

1. Doing a copy into a std::string for the export map
2. Doing another copy into the Python export map
3. Doing a final copy when you finally decide where the string should go

These are big strings, so every copy matters.
